Model¶

class model.ChebSampler(lnprob, param_dict, plot_name='plots/out_cheb.png', pool=None)[source]¶

Subclass of Sampler for evaluating Chebyshev parameters.

class model.CovSampler(lnprob, param_dict, plot_name='plots/out_cov.png', pool=None)[source]¶

Subclass of Sampler for evaluating CovarianceMatrix parameters.

class model.MegaSampler(samplers, burnInCadence, cadence)[source]¶

One Sampler to rule them all

Parameters:
  • samplers (list or tuple of :obj:`model.Sampler`s) – the various Sampler objects to sample
  • cadence (list or tuple) – of sub-iterations per iteration
class model.Model(DataSpectrum, Instrument, HDF5Interface, stellar_tuple, cov_tuple)[source]¶

Container class to create and bring together all of the relevant data and models to aid in evaulation.

Parameters:
  • DataSpectrum (spectrum.DataSpectrum object) – the data to fit
  • Instrument (grid_tools.Instrument object) – the instrument with which the data was acquired
  • HDF5Interface (grid_tools.HDF5Interface object) – the interface to the synthetic stellar library
  • stellar_tuple (tuple) – describes the order of parameters. If alpha is missing, :obj:grid_tools.ModelInterpolator is trilinear.
evaluate()[source]¶

Compare the different data and models.

evaluate_cho()[source]¶

Compare the different data and models.

get_data()[source]¶

Returns a DataSpectrum object.

class model.Sampler(lnprob, param_dict, plot_name='plots/out.png', pool=None)[source]¶

Helper class designed to be overwritten for StellarSampler, ChebSampler, CovSampler.C

plot()[source]¶

Generate the relevant plots once the sampling is done.

class model.SamplerStellarCheb(lnprob_stellar, stellar_dict, stellar_iterations)[source]¶

Sampler object explores the model in two different ways using a Gibbs Sampler with emcee instances.

Parameters:
  • lnprob_stellar – globally defined lnprob function for stellar parameters
  • lnprob_Cheb – globally defined lnprob function for Chebyshev coefficients

This can have a baked-in number of walkers per dimension, and total iteration time.

plot()[source]¶

Once the sampler is finished, generate all of the relevant plots for the run.

class model.StellarSampler(lnprob, param_dict, plot_name='plots/out_star.png', pool=None)[source]¶

Subclass of Sampler for evaluating stellar parameters.
